name: initial_preference_alignment
description: Measures the initial alignment of Ana and John's vacation preferences.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: final_agreement_score
description: Evaluates how much the final vacation decision aligns with each agent's preferences.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: decision_iterations
description: Tracks the number of iterations or discussions needed to reach a decision.

name: influence_score
description: Measures the influence each agent had on the final vacation decision.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: compromise_index
description: Measures how much each agent had to compromise from their initial preferences.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: satisfaction_score
description: Measures each agent's satisfaction with the final vacation decision.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: time_to_decision
description: Measures the time taken to reach a final vacation decision.

name: flexibility_score
description: Measures the willingness of each agent to adapt their preferences during the decision process.

tags.description: The name of the agent (Ana or John).

name: conflict_resolution_rate
description: Tracks the frequency and resolution of conflicts during the decision-making process.

name: consensus_level
description: Indicates the level of agreement between Ana and John on the final decision.
